CatDescriptText: Lucille Stockley, cook, Fifth Ward, was part of the Pittsburghers Speak Up column published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 29, 1960, pg. A1 with question: "Do you think there is too much emphasis placed on sports in high school and college?" Answer reads: "You have to have recreation in the schools...I don't think there's too much emphasis on sports."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Lucille Stockley wearing eyeglasses, light colored scarf, and dark coat with fur collar, standing on sidewalk in front of street with automobiles, another pose
